mapper.select: SELECT course_notice.`cn_id`AS cnId,course_notice.`cn_title`AS cnTitle , course_notice.`cn_p_date`AS cnPdate,course_notice.`cn_content`AS cnContent, teacher.`t_name`AS tName,teacher.`t_img_src` FROM course_notice,teacher_select_course,teacher WHERE course_notice.`tsc_id`=#{tscId} AND course_notice.`tsc_id`=teacher_select_course.`tsc_id` AND teacher_select_course.`t_id`=teacher.`t_id`
